release.action: Added logging of bad prepared statements to help diagnose things.
Fixed Mapper to properly deal with generated values
Added new built-in <lift:html5> snippet that sets HTML5 DOCTYPE on the XHTML response
JqJsCmds.ModalDialog now takes JsObj argument to work with BlockUI v2.x
Fixed typo in DerbyDriver.integerIndexColumnType: IDENITY -> IDENTITY
Fixed Mapper to use DriverType.columnTypeMap everywhere
Fixed Mapper logging to properly log inserts, updates and deletes

Breaking Changes:
1) LocParam
LocParam has been made a sealed trait to facilitate pattern matching within the Lift codebase and has had a contravariant type parameter added to its type to facilitate typesafe interactions with Loc[T]. The new trait is hence LocParam[-T]. As LocParam is now a sealed trait, I have added an extension point for user-specified LocParam subtypes as UserLocParam[-T] extends LocParam[T]. Since the new type parameter is contravariant, LocParam subclasses that are applicable for any Loc[T] have the type LocParam[Any], and a type alias AnyLocParam has been added for this type.
The Loc.checkProtected method now enforces type consistency between the evaluated Link[T] and the list of LocParam[T] which are used to evaluate whether the link is accessible given the specified parameters.
2) Renames
Previously, the "Param" suffix was used for two unrelated purposes within Loc: first, to refer to the type parameter of the Loc, and secondly for the LocParam configuration. This overloading made the code and the API somewhat difficult to read, so the first usage has been removed resulting in the following renames:
ParamType => T NullLocParams => //removed, Unit is sufficient! Loc.defaultParams => Loc.defaultValue Loc.forceParam => Loc.overrideValue Loc.foundParam => Loc.requestValue Loc.additionalKidParams => Loc.childValues
After this change, all instances of the "param" name within Loc should refer to something having to do with LocParam instances.
Non-Breaking Additions:
case class IfValue[T](test: Box[T] => Boolean, failMsg: FailMsg) extends LocParam[T] case class UnlessValue[T](test: Box[T] => Boolean, failMsg: FailMsg) extends LocParam[T] case class TestValueAccess[T](func: Box[T] => Box[LiftResponse]) extends LocParam[T]
If you are using a non-Unit typed Loc, you can use these LocParam instances to enforce access rules at the value level.
case class ValueTemplate[T](template: Box[T] => NodeSeq) extends LocParam[T] //per-value template selection
DataLoc[T] subclass of Loc was added to facilitate the use of the new more typeful LocParam subtypes.
A few changes to Link:
Since Link.createLink creates a Box[Text] (and not a clickable link) a couple of methods were added to create the intermediate, unboxed values in order that subclasses can more easily manipulate the resulting path:
Link.pathList(value: T): List[String] // added to facilitate creation of value-aware paths by subclasses. Link.createPath(value: T): String //creates the String representation of the path that is subsequently turned into XML and boxed by Link.createLink
Allowing page fragments wrapped by <lift:lazy-load> node to be processed and loaded asynchronously.
Updated documentation for Msgs
XmlResponse(...) now accepts optional HTTP status code, mime type and cookies.
SQL Server Alter Table Fails
Typo in Req.scala
Snapshot jars contains several Box.class files
Update hibernate-entitymanager to 3.4.0.GA.
Adjust javax.mail version range to avoid issues when Sun's repo is used and honor javax.activation being transitively pulled up my javax.mail.
Fix scala:doc and vscaladoc configuration along with provision for module specific configuration for packageLinkDefs.
Enforce Maven version 2.1.0 or higher, but lower than 3.0.
Upgrade Lift archetypes to use the new archetype metadata format. Enhance/fix archetype integration tests during build.
Enhance archetype metadata not to depend on ext.vm and allow one to set Lift version (-DliftVersion) or Scala version (-DscalaVersion) during archetype:generate.
Add ability to call JS code after AJAX form submit
Add AJAX editable field generator to SHtml, add AjaxEditableField to Mapper.
Fixed SQL Server drivers to use version-appropriate unicode columns for text.
Improve error message if database is not supported
Change net.liftweb.mapper.ByList to take a Seq[T] instead of a List[T]
Boxed payment status so that IPN cancelations appear as Empty. Breaking API change for implementors.
Textile parser outputs non-valid output. Changed some null to Null.
Enhanced the documentation for an type signatures for Actors
Revised Lift to use LiftActors and be compatible with Akka Actors
S.deleteCookie broken in M6
DB.runQuery isn't ConnectionIdentifier-aware
Misspelling in field name in ProtoExtendedSession
net.liftweb.widgets.autocomplete in version 1.1-M6 changed return type from NodeSeq to Elem
StatefulSnippets generate invalid markup
Updated Lift to use Scala 2.7.7
Stacked URL Rewriting correctly deals with params
Simplified Factory signatures in LiftRules
Restructured Lift codebase (now categorized into lift-base, lift-persistence, lift-modules, lift-archetypes and lift-examples).
Project build models are more enriched and streamlined.
JSON diff and merge
Generalized JSON serialization
Use paranamer to find out case class constructor argument names
Enhance CRUDify i18n
Add parameterized ?? to S
Inaccurate ranges for previous and next (page) in CRUDify
No i18n for "Sign Up" in MetaMegaProtoUser.signupXhtm
Lost password submit button is not rendered correctly
Signup mail body not i18ned
Misspelled Key "pasword.changed" in ProtoUser.scala
Enhance Msgs snippet to optionally show all messages
MappedPassword contains misspelled key for unset password
Added HTTP abstraction for making Lift container agnostic.
Added <lift:tail> builtin snippet for merging content at the end of body tag
Fixed Bug #34 - lift processing directives should be implemented as snippets
Added support for templates caching
Added support for multiple resource bundles
Consolidate LiftRules
Added HTTP authentication support
Upgrade to Scala 2.7.3
Upgrade to Scalacheck 1.5
Upgrade to Specs 1.4.0
Added Record/Field generic support
Changed Can to Box
Changed RequestState to Req
Updated LiftView to be more syntactically pleasing
Fixed a bug with how RequestVars and traits work
Enhanced the DateTime inputs
First pass at complete PayPal ITN and PDT stuff
Refactoring of the PayPal stuff
A Currency class
Added a nifty mechanism for stateful form management (Hoot)
Added fix CSS support
Added support for other JS libraries
Added JSON forms support
Updated to jQuery 1.2.6
Added PayPal Integration module
Redesigned Gavatar widget
Added URL rewriting support
Added CalendarDayView widget
Added CalendarWeekView widget
Switch from svn (code.google.com) to git (github) has scm to manage source
Use vscaladoc to generate API
Compiled the project with Scala-2.7.1
Start the lift-openid module
Start the lift-oauth module
Added CalendarMonthView widget
Start the lift-widgets module
Added ActorPing#scheduleAtFixedRate
Added notices support for Comet actors
Added JavaScript statements as JsCmd
Gave AMQPDispatcher users the ability to auto-reconnect to the amqp server if it restarts.

- Separating html functions from S object to SHtml object - Putting LiftRules in its own file - Adding support for associating messages with ID's to allow form fields validation messages. - ValidationIssue renamed into FieldError and lives in http package - ErrorReport built in snippet was renamed to Msgs - Added Msg built in snippet used for form field messages (Renders only messages associated with this tag id)
Extracted from the Helpers class, documented and tested ClassHelpers, ControlHelpers and TimeHelpers Traits
Adding unload hooks so a user's lift app can make sure that certain methods are called when the war is unloaded by the servlet container.
Adding a bunch of Responses to help make building RESTful Web Services easier in lift.
Added extensible support for specifying the behavior for invalid URI's (with or without site map)
Changes LiftServlet object name to LiftRules
Changed Loc behavior to use ResponseIt
Added RedirectWithState
Added a KeyedCache for model objects built on top of the LRU class.
Split lift-core into several modules : lift-webkit, lift-amqp, lift-facebook, lift-testkit, lift-textile, lift-xmpp
Compiled the project with Scala-2.7.0
Added RedirectResponse class
Added lift core localization support.
Added Cookie support.
Updating our version of jQuery to 1.2.3.
Added a new method to MetaMapper that lets you find models by PreparedStatement. findByPreparedStatement
Added a new QueryParam, ByList which lets you query on Model objects with a List[T].
Revised the example site to use Blueprint CSS for style
jlift JavaScript utilities and associated binder helpers.
Blueprint CSS built in (version 0.6) so it can be served via /classpath
XML -> JavaScript bindings so that JSON -> XHTML rendering can be defined using Scala XML literals, but the resulting JavaScript code can be sent to the browser to do mass rendering of JSON objects.
Added JSON support including: - S.buildJSONFunc - JSONHandler class - Lots of fancy JavaScript expression building
When lift is running in test mode, the default form generators will insert lift:field_name attribute into the form fields to aid in testing

Added json2.js (and minified version) Enhanced the resource serving stuff so that: - The path is defined in LiftServlet and changable (defaults to "classpath") - Moved the resource location from the root to "toserve" (can be changed) to avoid any possible way of serving up classes - The white list is a Partial Function for more flexibility - The white list by default contains jquery.js and json.js - There's a re-writer to re-write the request into an actual file (so jquery.js gets re-written to jquery-1.2.2-min.js)
Parser Combinator Helper routines
MappedField.toForm now returns a Can[NodeSeq] so a field can be omitted from a form
Added the "record" and "record_mgt" packages with half-baked record and field stuff in them
Added LocInfo and LocInfoVal to SiteMap for storing CSS and other tidbits about each menu item
Fixed the 'Welcome to the your project' type-o

Further abstracted the whole logging thing. There's a default log4j setup that can be overriden. The LiftLogger trait is made concrete in Log4JLogger, but the generic LiftLogger creation is done by function that can be modified in LogBoot: var loggerByName: String => LiftLogger = _logger; var loggerByClass: Class => LiftLogger = _loggerCls; One can insert a new logging system into lift by replacing the loggerByName and loggerByClass functions with appropriate functions that return a LiftLogger.
MappedText and MapperFakeClob classes
Extensive updates to the <lift:xxx /> tag mechanism that uses tag labels as snippets and support for adding arbitrary tag handling to lift.
Added XMPP support for lift applications. see the package net.liftweb.xmpp
Added support for switching XHTML MIME type serving off. See LiftServet.useXhtmlMimeType
Upgrade to scala-2.6.1
Support for PosgreSQL 8.1 and some tests
Adding support to H2 to lift-ORM
Adding support to PostgreSQL to lift-ORM
/html/body//head are merged into /html/head, to allow html fragment inlined into body to contribute to /html/head
Adding a new lift archetype, lift-archetype-basic that will generate a lift template with basic database and users functionality.
Adding LiftConsole to archetype to play with lift-based application in console mode
Adding mock for HTTPRequest and Co
Adding first Specs test to test lift-core
The look of the maven site generated (for lift itself and for archetypes)
Removing deprecated new_proj (replaced by archetypes)
Removing lift-archetype-hellolift (replaced by lift-archetype-basic (and the sample application hellolift))
Support for Ajax including integration of jQuery
Radically improved Comet support
Facebook API support
AMQP (RabbitMQ) support
Radically improved Comet support
Built in Traits for Users (including user management) and Tags
Support for a variety of new Mapped types (Country, Locale, Postal Code, etc.)
New examples including a real-time blog
Project builder using Maven and significantly improved Maven support
Localization
Improved XHTML support including proper headers based on browser type
Improved documentation
Radically improved samples and "getting started" pieces
support for multiple database instances
improved regex support including some Regex -> object creation support for parsing
a new and improved textile parser
"new_proj" script to create a new project
HTTP test framework for writing tests
Skittr code example -- a Twitter clone in lift and Scala
SiteMap -- define site navigation and access control rules in a Domain Specific Language
each model can live in a different database (multi database support)
support for Jetty continuations on AJAX calls (automatic, not application code required)
improvements to query building
Shared session variable across Snippets and Controllers
"recursive snippets" to re-write the page
ability to pass attributes to Snippets and Controllers
built in support for blowfish encryption
logging via log4j
MappedListEnum to persist List[Enumeration] easily
lots of HTML form elements (select, multiselect, etc.)
enhanced SQL queries
filterMap support for queries as the rows come back from the database
comparison operators for MappedField
run modes (Production, Test, Development, etc.)
properties that are based on user, machine, and run mode
filters for fields such that input (and comparison and queries) can automatically be made upper case, lower case, trim, etc.
